tasks.title: Migrate from DuckDB to SQLite with Ecto
tasks.description: Replace DuckDB implementation with SQLite using Ecto. Update PageController and NoteLive to use Ecto queries instead of Duckdbex. Enable commented-out Ecto dependencies in mix.exs (phoenix_ecto, ecto_sql). Update database configuration to use SQLite adapter. Create proper Ecto schema for Note model (currently commented out). Migrate data from note.csv to SQLite database.
acceptanceCriteria: Ecto dependencies are enabled in mix.exs
Database config updated to use SQLite adapter
Blog.Note schema is properly defined with Ecto
PageController uses Ecto queries instead of Duckdbex
NoteLive uses Ecto queries instead of Duckdbex
DuckComponents module is removed or deprecated
Note data migrated from CSV to SQLite
Search functionality works with Ecto queries

tasks.title: Implement blog post creation and management interface
tasks.description: Create admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting blog posts. Add authentication to protect admin routes. Implement form for creating new posts with title, content (markdown), tags, categories, and image upload. Add validation and error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin LiveView created for post management
Create post form with markdown editor
Edit existing post functionality
Delete post with confirmation
Image upload functionality
Tag and category management
Basic authentication to protect admin routes
Form validation and error messages display

tasks.title: Enhance blog post features with categories and tags filtering
tasks.description: Implement filtering by tags and categories on the blog listing page. Add category and tag pages to show all posts with specific tag/category. Update the UI to display tags and categories as clickable filters. Optimize database queries with proper indexes.
acceptanceCriteria: Tags are clickable and filter posts
Categories are clickable and filter posts
Dedicated tag and category pages created
URL structure supports filtering (e.g., /tag/elixir, /category/tutorial)
Database indexes added for performance
Filter state persists in URL params
Combined search and filter functionality works

tasks.title: Add RSS feed and SEO optimization
tasks.description: Generate RSS/Atom feed for blog posts. Add proper meta tags for SEO (title, description, Open Graph, Twitter Cards). Implement sitemap generation. Add structured data markup for blog posts. Ensure proper heading hierarchy and semantic HTML.
acceptanceCriteria: RSS feed available at /feed.xml or /rss
Meta tags (og:title, og:description, og:image) on all pages
Twitter Card meta tags implemented
Sitemap.xml generated and accessible
JSON-LD structured data for blog posts
Proper HTML semantic structure (h1, article, time tags)
Canonical URLs set correctly

tasks.title: Implement code syntax highlighting and markdown enhancements
tasks.description: Add syntax highlighting for code blocks in markdown posts using a library like Makeup or highlight.js. Enhance markdown rendering with table of contents generation, anchor links for headings, and copy buttons for code blocks. Improve reading experience with estimated reading time.
acceptanceCriteria: Code blocks have syntax highlighting
Language detection or explicit language specification works
Table of contents auto-generated from headings
Heading anchor links work for sharing
Copy button on code blocks
Estimated reading time displayed on posts
Responsive code block styling
Dark mode support for code highlighting
